did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.physloc: State Records Center - Archives Annex, Library of Virginia

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Smyth County (Va.) Election Records, 1832-1959, Local government records collection, Smyth County Court Records. The Library of Virginia, Richmond, Va. 23219.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: These items came to the Library of Virginia in a shipment of court papers from Smyth County.

bioghist.head: Historical Information
bioghist.p: Smyth County was named for Alexander Smyth, a congressman from Virginia in 1832 when the county was formed from Washington and Wythe counties. Its area is 435 square miles, and the county seat is Marion.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Smyth County (Va.) Election Records, 1832-1959, contain Lists of Voters Registered and Poll Books.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: Additional Smyth County Records can be found on microfilm at the Library of Virginia. Consult "A Guide to Virginia County and City Records on Microfilm"
